name: SharedTools
question_1:
This project helps anyone deploy detailed testnet smart contracts based on ERC 20, ERC721, and ERC1155 using a friendly UI. They also provide vote Escrow UI among other fantastic tools. Other pros include:

- UI for those who don't want to use scripts to deploy contracts
- Easy to follow controls
- Opens up the opportunity to write smart contract to a wider public
- Active development on OVM implementations
- A little bit of love might help the devs develop this into a full-scale mainnet tool as well.
